testcase.name: orawls::urandomfix CentOS on operatingsystem CentOS should contain Exec[set urandom /etc/sysconfig/rngd] with user => "root"
orawls::urandomfix CentOS on operatingsystem CentOS should contain Service[rngd] with ensure => "running" and enable => true
orawls::urandomfix CentOS on operatingsystem CentOS should contain Exec[chkconfig rngd] with user => "root" and command => "chkconfig --add rngd"
